column5: Apply for the part-time course here.Learn to help organisations compete more successfully through better strategy and financial management, in the UK or internationally.
column7: Our tuition fee for UK students starting full-time study in 2023/24 is £9,910 for the course.  Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year-15 months full-time, 2 years-30 months part-time
